name: Fleeting Glory
description: The Norcadians have decided to bring tsunkatse matches to the galaxy, but it seems they've made no adjustments to their existing practices. Bring the curtain down on this bloodsport before someone gets killed.
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Supply Missions in another Phase.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Horseback Picard, any version of M'Benga, Rutherford, Penk, or Athletes will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the D'Kora Krayton, the Tsunkatse Vessel, or the Galaxy Class Ship will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Horseback Picard, M'Benga, Rutherford, Penk, or Athletes
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Crusher
featured_crew.flavor: During training, Crusher is happy to not only listen to Troi about her romantic experiences, but also support and give advice.

action.name: Who Needs Rational When Your Toes Curl Up?

featured_crew.name: Rutherford
featured_crew.flavor: Secret training with Boimler does not produce any results - they still lose in a two-on-one match with Mariner. Again.

action.name: Hopefully We Picked Up A Few Of Your Moves

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

ship.name: Galaxy Class Ship
ship.flavor: One of the largest and most powerful classes of ship in Starfleet's history.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

action.name: Who Needs Rational When Your Toes Curl Up?

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Crusher
rewards.flavor: During training, Crusher is happy to not only listen to Troi about her romantic experiences, but also support and give advice.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.

Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Secret training with Boimler does not produce any results - they still lose in a two-on-one match with Mariner. Again.

action.name: Hopefully We Picked Up A Few Of Your Moves

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "H-hey, Captain, thanks for answering my hails! I'm dealing with a little cognitive dissonance here. I'm actually getting to meet THE M'Benga, just like Mariner and Boimler, but, uh, he's probably about to kill me!"

"Relax, my young friend. I told you it would be all right. Captain, it's good of you to check in. Unfortunately, those of us who signed up for these galactic tsunkatse matches quickly found the Norcadians lied about lowering the stakes. We need your assistance."

"Come now, you're not leaving before the match, are you, Doctor? You can't fault a businessman for knowing what works. I have to give the audience what they want. After all, what's the fun in a bloodsport without the blood?"
"Blood? Oh no, I like to keep my blood on the inside of me! Captain, please get us out of here! Get us off this ship!"

"H-hey, Captain, thanks for answering my hails! I'm dealing with a little cognitive dissonance here. I'm actually getting to meet THE M'Benga, just like Mariner and Boimler, but, uh, he's probably about to kill me!"

"Relax, my young friend. I told you it would be all right. Captain, it's good of you to check in. Unfortunately, those of us who signed up for these galactic tsunkatse matches quickly found the Norcadians lied about lowering the stakes. We need your assistance."

"Come now, you're not leaving before the match, are you, Doctor? You can't fault a businessman for knowing what works. I have to give the audience what they want. After all, what's the fun in a bloodsport without the blood?"
"Blood? Oh no, I like to keep my blood on the inside of me! Captain, please get us out of here! Get us off this ship!"
